description:
The current Readme.md of the repo has a few typos and one line is also missing. 

1. The title text should be 'Fiinwallet' rather than 'fiinwallet'.
2. The installation guidelines should be corrected to 
   git clone https://github.com/openMF/fiinwallet

   cd fiinwallet

   cd app

    npm install

    ionic serve



#### steps to follow

1. If you are not familiar with how to make a pr, please go through https://opensource.com/article/19/7/create-pull-request-github

2. Edit the readme.md file as directed

3. Submit the PR link as submission.

Note:- you can directly edit the readme.md file in the repo on the github website itself, but going through the classical way is highly appreciated for learning.
name: Edit the Readme.md
